amendment.description: Reiterating the importance of the Federal Emergency Management Agency and its continued role in providing nonpartisan and long-term disaster relief to disaster survivors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1774 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 177.

action.text: Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator Padilla to Amendment SA 1717.
